title: [Large-Scale] Scientific Creativity Enhancement Program Utilizing Virtual Studios

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Conducting scientific problem-solving activities in a virtual studio environment that promotes learner collaboration, providing content optimized for individual mobile device access

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively establish scientific hypotheses and complete experimental designs with over 80% accuracy in VsLEs environments
Learners can produce science projects meeting creativity evaluation criteria (originality, flexibility, elaboration) using digital tools at least three times
Learners can reflect on their thinking processes through VsLEs feedback systems and create improvement plans with over 70% participation rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
